internships.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
responsibilities: Developed responsive interfaces with HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
Utilized Bootstrap for consistent, user-friendly design across projects.
Contributed to diverse full-stack tasks, gaining hands-on end-to-end experience.

internships.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Worked on frameworks like Gatsby, Astro for modifying the website and added CMS to the project.
Gained practical insights and exposure to the latest technologies in the industry.

academic_projects.title: Text Augmentation using Generative Adversarial Networks, EDA and Backtranslation
description: Processed text augmentation using GANs, compared to Easy Data Augmentation and back translation methods.
Generated new, semantically similar sentences from an existing sentence, to increase the size and diversity of a dataset.
Using GANs significantly improved the performance of a classifier.

academic_projects.title: Forest fire detection and ecosystem preservation using Computer Vision
description: Detected forest fires in real-time using computer vision, specifically the YOLOv3 object detection algorithm.
Analyzed large datasets to derive meaningful insights and provided actionable recommendations to the team.
Detected the location of fires, and sent notifications to corresponding authorities for quick measures.

academic_projects.title: Garbage Detection using Computer Vision
description: Used the YOLOv3 computer vision algorithm to identify waste materials in real-time.
Developed ETL processes to automate data collection, detected the presence of garbage and sent the location data to the relevant authorities for appropriate action.
Enhanced the efficiency of waste management by automating the detection process and ensuring that waste is disposed of properly.

positions_of_responsibility.title: Chief of Outreach
responsibilities: Led community engagement, brought prominent speakers through targeted research, secured sponsorships, and orchestrated high-impact events.
Elevated organizational visibility through strategic publicity, fostering key partnerships for exponential growth.

positions_of_responsibility.title: Aesthetics Head
responsibilities: Designed visually stunning art installations for events, also creating art to showcase our creativity on social media.

positions_of_responsibility.title: Graphic Coordinator
responsibilities: Created eye-catching designs for events and informative posts for social media.

publications.title: Text Data Augmentation Using Generative Adversarial Networks, Back Translation and EDA
